LanguageData.FOU.Settings.Category.Label: Foreigner of Universe
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.NanitesMaxStorage.Label: <color=#D09B61>higher-dimensional nanites</color> max storage capacity:
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.NanitesMaxStorage.Tooltip: Configures the maximum <color=#D09B61>higher-dimensional nanites</color> storage allocated for <color=#D09B61>special abilities</color> consumption.
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.NanitesDailyReplicationAmou: Configures the daily natural regeneration rate of resources consumed by the default <color=#D09B61>higher-dimensional nanites</color> gene's <color=#D09B61>special abilities</color>.
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.RegenerationPerDay.Label: Daily healing capacity:
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.RegenerationPerDay.Tooltip: Configures the daily recovery capacity of <color=#D09B61>higher-dimensional nanites</color> for host's physiological damage.
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.MatterRecoveryCost.Label: <color=#D09B61>Matter Recovery</color> ability consumption:
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.MatterRecoveryCost.Tooltip: Configures the <color=#D09B61>higher-dimensional nanites</color> required to activate <color=#D09B61>Matter Recovery</color> ability.
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.IndiscriminateDisintegratio: Configures the <color=#D09B61>higher-dimensional nanites</color> required to execute <color=#D09B61>Indiscriminate Disintegration</color> ability.
Configures the damage inflicted by the default <color=#D09B61>Indiscriminate Disintegration</color> ability on targets.
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.InstantRecoverCooldown.Tool: Configures the cooldown duration of the <color=#D09B61>Stimulate Nanites</color> ability available to pawns with the <color=#D09B61>Matter Manipulation</color> gene upon death or downing.\n\nThe unit here is <color=#D09B61>Tick</color>, and 60,000 <color=#D09B61>Ticks</color> equal one in-game day.
LanguageData.FOU.Settings.ResetButton.Label: Reset
